name: Terrorbeast

auras.raw_description:
Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 25%.
. Ca

skills.name: Painful Bite
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of increasing the cooldown of one of the target's skills by 1 turn at random.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Shriek
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Damage inflicted is proportional to this Champion's MAX HP.
Damage based on: [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Flesh Feast
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Fully heals this Champion if the target is killed by this attack.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
